            Hello! I’m David Harper, CFA, FRM. I started bionicturtle.com in
            2004 and built it into the #1 exam preparation provider
            (EPP) for the Financial Risk Manager (FRM). In February of
            2021, I sold the business to CeriFi where I continue to run
            it as President, Bionic Turtle, a CeriFi company. And now
            I’m part
            of a great team that is building the world’s greatest
            platform for financial education at every stage of your
            career.
            I love teaching (and learning about) risk. I’m also write
            articles at Seeking Alpha, where I disclose my
            portfolio/trades and practice risk management. I have a BA,
            Economics from UC, Berkeley. I earned my CFA in 2003 and my
            FRM in 2004. I’m also always practicing some data
            science.
            This is a distill site
            and this About page is a postcard
            (by Sean Kross)
